get.description: This API lists a particular number of tickets that are associated to you from your help desk, based on the limit specified.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Key that returns additional information related to a ticket. Values allowed are: contacts, products, and assignee. All three values can be passed by separating them with a comma in the API request.

schema.description: Key that returns additional information related to a ticket. Values allowed are: contacts, products, and assignee. All three values can be passed by separating them with a comma in the API request.

parameters.name: follower
parameters.description: Filter by followers of the ticket. Values allowed : a valid @agentId@.

schema.description: Filter by followers of the ticket. Values allowed : a valid @agentId@.

parameters.name: sharedDepartmentId
parameters.description: Fetches only the tickets shared from @departmentId@ to @sharedDepartmentId@. If @departmentId@ is not provided, fetches all the tickets shared to @sharedDepartmentId@. @sharedDepartmentId@ is given precedence only when @isShared@ is @false@/not given.

schema.description: Fetches only the tickets shared from @departmentId@ to @sharedDepartmentId@. If @departmentId@ is not provided, fetches all the tickets shared to @sharedDepartmentId@. @sharedDepartmentId@ is given precedence only when @isShared@ is @false@/not given.

parameters.name: isShared
parameters.description: Filter all shared tickets actually belonging to @departmentId@ if @isShared@ is true. If @departmentId@ is not provided and if @isShared@ is true, shared tickets from all permitted departments will be listed. If @departmentId@ is provided and @isShared@ is @true@, tickets belonging to @departmentId@, but shared to any other department will be fetched. If @departmentId@ and @sharedDepartmentId@ is provided and @isShared@ is @true@, then tickets belonging to @departmentId@, but shared to @sharedDepartmentId@ will be fetched(Here permission checks are done on @departmentId@). If @departmentId@ and @sharedDepartmentId@ is provided and @isShared@ is @false@/not given, then tickets shared to @sharedDepartmentId@, but belonging to @departmentId@ will be fetched(Here permission checks are done on @sharedDepartmentId@).

schema.description: Filter all shared tickets actually belonging to @departmentId@ if @isShared@ is true. If @departmentId@ is not provided and if @isShared@ is true, shared tickets from all permitted departments will be listed. If @departmentId@ is provided and @isShared@ is @true@, tickets belonging to @departmentId@, but shared to any other department will be fetched. If @departmentId@ and @sharedDepartmentId@ is provided and @isShared@ is @true@, then tickets belonging to @departmentId@, but shared to @sharedDepartmentId@ will be fetched(Here permission checks are done on @departmentId@). If @departmentId@ and @sharedDepartmentId@ is provided and @isShared@ is @false@/not given, then tickets shared to @sharedDepartmentId@, but belonging to @departmentId@ will be fetched(Here permission checks are done on @sharedDepartmentId@).

parameters.name: commenter
parameters.description: Filter by commenters of the ticket. Values allowed : a valid @agentId@. As of now, either @follower@ or @commenter@ is supported. If both params are given, @commenter@ will be ignored.

schema.description: Filter by commenters of the ticket. Values allowed : a valid @agentId@. As of now, either @follower@ or @commenter@ is supported. If both params are given, @commenter@ will be ignored.

get.description: This API gets the archived tickets count  in given department

post.description: This API updates multiple tickets at once.
This API deletes the given spam tickets

get.summary: Get colliding users action and chat status in a ticket
get.description: This API should be called after ticket is rendered in detailed view. This returns collision users (agent Id, their action in ticket and author details) and chat status of that collision. 'chatId' returns the uniqueId of the chat that belongs to a collision session. This chatId should be used only for publishing messages within the chat members. 'chatUsers' returns the agentIds of current users in chat. The colliding users action is identified by 2 arrays, 'collidingUsers' returns the agentIds of users colliding in ticket and 'usersAction' returns the action of corresponding colliding users in the same order respectively. The values 'collidingUsers' and 'usersAction' will be deprecated soon (DONOT USE THESE VALUES)
Get online agents ticket count

parameters.name: dueInMinutes
parameters.description: Number of minutes left for resolving the ticket. Currently, the minimum number of minutes is 5 and the maximum is 2,880. This query param can return overdue and no-due tickets too. Values allowed are @overDue@, @5@, @10@, @15@, @30@, @45@, @60@, @90@, @120@, @180@, @360@, @540@, @720@, @1080@, @1440@, @2880@, @noDue@, and @onhold@.

schema.description: Number of minutes left for resolving the ticket. Currently, the minimum number of minutes is 5 and the maximum is 2,880. This query param can return overdue and no-due tickets too. Values allowed are @overDue@, @5@, @10@, @15@, @30@, @45@, @60@, @90@, @120@, @180@, @360@, @540@, @720@, @1080@, @1440@, @2880@, @noDue@, and @onhold@.

get.summary: Get Shared Access Details based on Sharing type
get.description:
This API fetches the different access rights configured for the sharing modes available in Zoho Desk.
The sharing modes are: READ_WRITE, READ_ONLY, and RESTRICTED_ACCESS. 
Possible Keys
forward - Boolean - Determines if a private reply, private thread, or a draft can be forwarded;
sendReply - Boolean - Determines if a public reply and comment can be made;
printThread - Boolean - Determines if a thread can be printed
showOriginal - Boolean - Determines if the More Actions set that belongs to a thread can be accessed
allowedIntegratedActions - List - Values allowed: NONE, ALL
unWritableProperties - List - Values allowed: NONE, ALL, or set of properties to be restricted
readableSubEntities - List - Values allowed: NONE, ALL, or set of sub-entities that can be accessed
unReadableProperties - List - Values allowed: NONE, ALL, or set of properties to be restricted
unWritableSubEntities - List - Values allowed: NONE, ALL, or set of sub-entities to be restricted

This API does not fetch access rights configured for viewing Auto Suggestions, Timeline, and Agent Collision.
